Comparison HelpersÔÉÅ

Helper classes for comparison management.

This module contains helper classes that provide static methods for comparison validation and sub-comparison creation. These helpers separate concerns and make the ComparisonManager more focused.

  • Comparison Validation Helper
  • Sub Comparison Creation Helper
